settings.title: Power Tools & Trade Supplies for Ashford Kent
settings.paragraph_1: Ashford is one of Kent's fastest-growing towns, with major developments at Chilmington Green, Finberry and the expanding Eureka Business Park creating sustained demand for skilled tradespeople and the tools they rely on. Invicta Tools at our Canterbury branch is a straightforward 25-minute drive up the A28 — a genuine trade supplier with authorised dealer status for Makita and DeWalt.
settings.paragraph_2: The scale of building work around Ashford — from the thousands of new homes at Chilmington to commercial fit-outs near the International Station — means you need a tool supplier who holds serious stock. We're not a click-and-hope online retailer; we're a trade counter with 28+ years of experience and deep inventory across power tools, hand tools, fixings and consumables.
settings.paragraph_3: Ashford tradespeople who register for a trade account get competitive pricing, priority on back-orders, and a single monthly invoice. Order online for free delivery to TN23–TN26 postcodes over £30, or drive up to Canterbury for same-day collection.

settings.title: Need Tools in Ashford?
settings.subtitle: Call our Canterbury branch for expert advice, or shop online with free delivery over £30.
